name: Solare
description:
Solare is a narrative-adventure in the Solarpunk genre in a topdown pixel artstyle. The player tries to save the city in the expiring time. The time and energy mechanics are the center of the game, with an engaging narrative system.

This is a demo version done as a semester project by the student dev group Lost & Found Games.

Find us on social media: @LostFoundGames
